sentences.sContent: He must have had some ups and downs in life to make him such a churl.
sentences.sContent_eng: He must have had some ups and downs in life to make him such a churl.
sentences.sCn: 他一生一定经历过一些坎坷，才使他变成这么一个粗暴的人吧。

sentences.sContent: He must have had some ups and downs in life to make him such a churl.
sentences.sContent_eng: He must have had some ups and downs in life to make him such a churl.
sentences.sCn: 他一生一定经历过一些坎坷， 才使他变成这么一个粗暴的人。

sentences.sContent: He must have had some ups and downs in life to make him such a churl. Do you know anything of his history?
sentences.sContent_eng: He must have had some ups and downs in life to make him such a churl. Do you know anything of his history?
sentences.sCn: 他一生一定经历过一些坎坷，才使他变成这么一个粗暴的人吧。你知道一点他的经历吗？

synos.tran: 吝啬鬼；乡下人；粗暴的人；（中世纪的）农民

words.tran: 没有礼貌的；脾气暴躁的
